FOSS Image Editor // Menu About License Contribute Help Adjust Filter Crop Artwork Overwrite original Share Add text Save Pick image // Filter Saturation Exposure Contrast White balance HUE Gamma Color Balance Sepia Monochrome RGB Haze Vignette Blur Sharpen Cartoon Crosshatch Poster Suppress non maximum Weak pixel inclusion Halftone Invert Sketch // Dialog OK Cancel Share using: This will overwrite the original image and delete the edited image. Proceed? Could not save image. Could not load image. Enter your text: \"FOSS Image Editor\" needs the permission to \"read and write on your storage\". This is needed to save the edited images on you SD card. Please grant the permission on the following dialog. As said: the permission is needed. The app will not work. // About dialogs Copyright Â© 2018 by Gaukler Faun For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/FOSSImageEditor

Farbenkreis zur Symbolisierung des menschlichen Geistes- und Seelenlebens
Gemeinfrei
Johann Wolfgang Goethe
https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Datei:Goethe,_Farbenkreis_zur_Symbolisierung_des_menschlichen_Geistes-_und_Seelenlebens,_1809.jpg#/media/File:Goethe,_Farbenkreis_zur_Symbolisierung_des_menschlichen_Geistes-_und_Seelenlebens,_1809.jpg First I would like to thank all people who contributed in any way on this project. They submitted issues, translated or helped in any other way. On following sites you can become a active member of this great community:

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"FOSS Image Editor\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"FOSS Image Editor\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/FOSSImageEditor


Following people contributed at this project. If I have forgotten anybody, please contact me:

Gaukler Faun
\u25AA Main developer and initiator of this project
https://github.com/scoute-dich Loading images
\u25AA Using the menu \"Pick image\" will launch your Gallery, where you can pick an image.
\u25AA You can share pictures from any app to \"FOSS Image Editor\".
\u25AA \"FOSS Image Editor\" can also be launched as default image editor from other apps.

Saving images
\u25AA Every time you made a change to your image you have to save by pressing the \"Check button\". All images will be stored in the \"FOSS_ImageEditor\" directory inside your default \"Pictures\" folder.
\u25AA You can overwrite the original image. This will also delete the image inside the \"FOSS_ImageEditor\" directory.

Add text
Enter text and press the \"OK\" button. On the next screen you can resize and rotate the text with two finger gestures or change the color. When finished press the \"SET\" button.
